articles.author: Makini Brice, Nick Carey
articles.title: Stellantis warns on profit, citing global markets, Chinese competition - Reuters
articles.description: Stellantis cut its 2024 profit forecast on Monday and warned it will burn through more cash than expected as Europe's No.2 carmaker pledged to reduce output and offer big discounts to revive its U.S. business, wiping billions of its market value.
